metadata.name: Racing+
metadata.description:
[h1][b]Racing+ A racing mod for The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth+[/b][/h1]
Normally a single player game, the Lua mod, client, and server allow players to be able to race against each other in real time.
Find out more at [url=https://isaacracing.net]the official Racing+ webpage[/url].
